name: bluesman
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a man who plays or sings the blues (= a type of music first sung by African-Americans about life's problems, and later leading to rock and roll and jazz music): Aged only 14, he accompanied bluesman Joe Taggart on a recording date at a Chicago studio. He has been called the last of the real-deal bluesmen in St. Louis.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is an even greater bluesman than he is a rock star.Veteran bluesman John Lee Hooker died at home in his sleep in Los Altos, CA at the age of 83.
